title: 325btc
author: 325btc
content: Are u ?Do you have electric generator teady?A lot water? Cans of food ?Weapons ? Are you prepped?Many people prep now for the doomsdayIf not how u think u gona survive?I dont prep becpuse i know if i have money i dont give damn what regime what puppet is installed on goverment and what situation in the world i live west london upscale area so i have no worries a lot illuminati members here also so no neeed to worry World leaders" never s####t where they themselfes and tgeir family and friends"We should here what the biden and other leaders will say about doomsday

comments.author: mk4
comments.body: Quote from: 325btc on July 22, 2022, 12:36:05 PMI dont prep becpuse i know if i have money i dont give damn what regime what puppet is installed on goverment and what situation in the world i live west london upscale area so i have no worries a lot illuminati members here also so no neeed to worry If the worst come to the worst, your typical bank currency isn't going to save you. Preppers actually 'prep' for the case that if cash becomes worthless and the likes of food/medicine/ammunition/clothing/etc becomes the de-facto currency. Barter style.

comments.author: 325btc
comments.body: Quote from: mk4 on July 22, 2022, 01:28:31 PMQuote from: 325btc on July 22, 2022, 12:36:05 PMI dont prep becpuse i know if i have money i dont give damn what regime what puppet is installed on goverment and what situation in the world i live west london upscale area so i have no worries a lot illuminati members here also so no neeed to worry If the worst come to the worst, your typical bank currency isn't going to save you. Preppers actually 'prep' for the case that if cash becomes worthless and the likes of food/medicine/ammunition/clothing/etc becomes the de-facto currency. Barter style.Bank has liability if so then bank will have obligaton to give food or what ever i need if no cash or funds.

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: What is the benefit of the generator of electricity for the doomsday? Mostly, you will not find any fuel and you will not be able to operate these devices, so the ideal case is to use solar energy, wind energy or any renewable energy sources depending on your region.As for preparing for it, it is to try to live on the minimum and when you have fears, you buy a plot in the countryside, which has a water well and generates electricity with solar energy, and then you prepare with a few trainings and learn how to farm and raise livestock.As for the preparation, most of them will not be ready, but they will be ready in a short period of time.

comments.author: mk4
comments.body: Quote from: 325btc on July 22, 2022, 01:30:18 PMBank has liability if so then bank will have obligaton to give food or what ever i need if no cash or funds.Since when did banks have the obligation to give you your needs lmao? Banks aren't some charity that's out there to save you. Banks are a business, and the goal of such business is to profit off you, not necessarily to help you or save you.If anything, most banks are scums. Heck, it's not uncommon seeing banks revoke people's access to their funds.

comments.author: Z-tight
comments.body: Is the world coming to an end? Or am i missing something here 325btc, your topics are incessantly so weird, and sometimes comic, what doomsday are you talking about, and how does it concern economic discussions that this section is for.Since this doomsday is upon us, what is the use of preparing, let us all just suck the doom in, after all we'll all be doomed right.Who knows, maybe after it is all over, things turn on its head and bitcoin becomes the only currency!

comments.body: Quote from: Z-tight on July 22, 2022, 01:44:49 PMIs the world coming to an end? Or am i missing something here 325btc, your topics are incessantly so weird, and sometimes comic, what doomsday are you talking about, and how does it concern economic discussions that this section is for.Since this doomsday is upon us, what is the use of preparing, let us all just suck the doom in, after all we'll all be doomed right.Who knows, maybe after it is all over, things turn on its head and bitcoin becomes the only currency!  Exonomoic crash big crash and shortages of money

comments.author: Gyfts
comments.body: Quote from: 325btc on July 22, 2022, 01:50:36 PMQuote from: Z-tight on July 22, 2022, 01:44:49 PMIs the world coming to an end? Or am i missing something here 325btc, your topics are incessantly so weird, and sometimes comic, what doomsday are you talking about, and how does it concern economic discussions that this section is for.Since this doomsday is upon us, what is the use of preparing, let us all just suck the doom in, after all we'll all be doomed right.Who knows, maybe after it is all over, things turn on its head and bitcoin becomes the only currency!  Exonomoic crash big crash and shortages of moneyEconomic crashes happen all the time. I'd be more worried about the nuclear "doomsday" scenario. Seems the world is getting closer to global conflicts in an age of nuclear weapons. We essentially have to rely on dictatorial maniacs keeping the peace. WW2 would have looked a lot different in the Germans were able develop their nuclear technology at the same rate as the U.S. In the true doomsday scenario, I would not prepare. Surviving a nuclear winter, even living in a bunker, would be miserable. Stocking up on a few extra cases of water and cans of food isn't going to help much during a nuclear winter. At that point, it'd be worth it just to accept your fate.

comments.author: Mr.right85
comments.body: Quote from: 325btc on July 22, 2022, 12:36:05 PM<< >>Your clearly watching so much of Holywood movies and no doubt, these movies express some sad realities that could befall man while presenting some solutions in new inventions to the ills of the time. Let's say am to go down that path of imagination with you...I haven't been around much and so I can't tell what the 1st and 2nd world war was like but if you ask me, the closest we could get to a doomsday is in a 3rd world war. It could get really ugly, given the level of suffistication of war machines of our time and the places I think would be hit the most are the places we seem to consider safe. Every nation with a stronghold becomes a target and you can never be prepared enough being in the hot zones.

comments.author: Text
comments.body: Even if you have the resources, it still limited. You don't know when this doomsday will last and if it would ended before you run out of need.If you survive, would you continue surviving the aftermath?

comments.author: ms-bit
comments.body: Do you really think you can be prepared for the doomsday? Maybe you can survive the catastrophe, but then

comments.author: libertasbella
comments.body: Quote from: ms-bit on July 24, 2022, 07:47:54 PMDo you really think you can be prepared for the doomsday? Maybe you can survive the catastrophe, but then  Doomsday, no. Most people couldn't afford to prepare for it. But a year's supply of canned food, a well and a few thousand round of ammo are in most people's budgets. Don't be totally vulnerable just because you can't afford a nuclear bunker.

comments.author: be.open
comments.body: Quote from: 325btc on July 22, 2022, 12:36:05 PMI dont prep becpuse i know if i have money i dont give damn what regime what puppet is installed on goverment and what situation in the world i live west london upscale area so i have no worries a lot illuminati members here also so no neeed to worry You are very naive in this regard. Any catastrophe on a planetary scale, whether man-made or natural, will inevitably be associated with the movement of large amounts of water from the world's oceans - and this is a priority threat direction if you are interested in surviving. Therefore, the islands and coastal regions of the continents are unreliable havens, regardless of their degree of prestige.

comments.author: Zlantann
comments.body: Quote from: Gyfts on July 22, 2022, 04:29:39 PMIn the true doomsday scenario, I would not prepare. Surviving a nuclear winter, even living in a bunker, would be miserable. Stocking up on a few extra cases of water and cans of food isn't going to help much during a nuclear winter. At that point, it'd be worth it just to accept your fate.Everyday I prepare for doomsday by living a day per time. Sometimes one worry about what tomorrow would bring but what would our worries change? The world is controlled by selfish and power drunk politicians. Their actions and inaction is causing more harm than good to the people and they don't care. Hence, for one not to develop health issues such as high blood pressure because of worries and anxiety, we must learn to enjoy every moment of life. I have learnt to accept life they way it unfolds. But the economic doomsday you are predicting is already happening in most countries. There are some countries that is lacking power supply, ravaged by war and battling currency failure. Hence, you doomsday prediction might be in developed nations.
